info.title: MeetoPlat API
info.description: All endpoints of the MeetoPlat API

get.summary: Get game stats for a specific user

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to get the game stats for

post.summary: Create game stats for the authenticated user

delete.summary: Delete game stats for a specific user

parameters.name: gameStatID
parameters.description: ID of the game stats to be deleted

put.summary: Update game stats for a specific user

parameters.name: gameStatID
parameters.description: ID of the game stats to be updated

post.summary: Create game mode stats for a specific user

requestBody.description: Game mode stats to be created

patch.summary: Update game mode stats for a specific user

parameters.name: gamemodeStatID
parameters.description: ID of the game mode stats to be updated

requestBody.description: Game mode stats to be updated

delete.summary: Delete game mode stats for a specific user

parameters.name: gamemodeStatID
parameters.description: ID of the game mode stats to be deleted

get.summary: Return all data from the authenticated user

200.description: Return all data from the authenticated user

get.summary: Return id, name, email, tag, avatar, date_of_birth, bio and socials from a specific user by id
Search for a user by name or tag

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term. Use 'name#tag' to search by both name and tag

patch.summary: Change the status of the authenticated user

400.description: Status change failed or already the same status.

message.example: Status change failed or already the same status.

post.summary: Update the avatar of the authenticated user

patch.summary: Update the bio of the authenticated user
Update the socials of the authenticated user
Update the password of the authenticated user

get.summary: Resend the email verification of the authenticated user

patch.summary: Update the email of the authenticated user

200.description: Email updated successfully, please verify your email. Token deleted.

message.example: Email updated successfully, please verify your email. Token deleted.

patch.summary: Update the name of the authenticated user

requestBody.description: New name and password for verification

post.summary: Login a user and return a new token

200.description: User logged in. New token created and old tokens deleted.

message.example: User logged in. New token created and old tokens deleted.

post.summary: Logout the authenticated user and delete all tokens

200.description: User logged out. All tokens deleted.

message.example: User logged out. All tokens deleted.

Bearer.description: Use a JWT token received from the authentication API.
Bearer.name: Bearer

tags.name: GameUserStats
tags.description: Endpoints for User Stats in Games
